last_episode_to_air.name: Michelle Gopaul
last_episode_to_air.overview: Desperate to save a faltering relationship with her boyfriend, Michelle Gopaul gets caught up in a web of deceptions and lies that ultimately threatens to send her to prison.

name: One Bad Choice
overview: How one bad decision can change where your life goes.

episodes.name: Belle Knox
episodes.overview: When faced with the possibility of dropping out of college, a studious girl solves her tuition problems through the adult industry.

episodes.name: Levi Sparks
episodes.overview: A street smart young man learns that a choice he has made has him looking at a possible life sentence.

episodes.name: Jessica Rasdall
episodes.overview: Out clubbing one night, Jessica Rasdall and her best friend Laura feel harassed by a club employee, leading Jessica to make a fateful choice that sends her life into a tailspin.

episodes.name: Kumari Fulbright
episodes.overview: When law student Kumari Fulbright suspects her boyfriend of stealing from her, she seeks the help of her former fiancée and makes a decision that could derail everything she has worked so hard for.

episodes.name: Stephan Perez
episodes.overview: Fighting to stay afloat at prestigious Columbia University, Stephan Perez starts using a friend’s Adderall as a study aid. This decision triggers a downhill spiral that puts his entire future in jeopardy.

episodes.name: Reggie Shaw
episodes.overview: On his way to work, Reggie Shaw makes a seemingly innocent choice that will leave him with terrible guilt and put his faith to the ultimate test.

episodes.name: Dona Huertas
episodes.overview: After Dona Huertas and her best friend take Ecstasy together on New Year’s Eve, a single decision made by Dona alters the course of both of their lives forever.

episodes.name: Kaitlyn Hunt
episodes.overview: After suddenly being arrested, high school senior Kaitlyn Hunt is devastated to discover that it’s her current romantic relationship that’s causing her to face serious jail time.

episodes.name: Meili Cady
episodes.overview: Struggling actress Meili Cady takes a job working for her best friend Lisette, a Beverly Hills heiress. But when Meili finally discovers the true nature of her work, she finds herself on the wrong side of the law.

episodes.name: Michelle Gopaul
episodes.overview: Desperate to save a faltering relationship with her boyfriend, Michelle Gopaul gets caught up in a web of deceptions and lies that ultimately threatens to send her to prison.
